name: mlflow-typescript
description: TypeScript implementation of MLflow Tracing SDK. This is the root workspace package that includes all the public packages as sub-directories.

scripts.build:subpackages: npm run build:core && npm run build:integrations
scripts.build:integrations: npm run -C integrations/openai build && npm run -C integrations/anthropic build && npm run -C integrations/gemini build
scripts.test: npm run test:core && npm run test:integrations
scripts.test:integrations: npm run test:openai && npm run test:anthropic && npm run test:gemini
